topic.title: Using Perl CPAN
topic.shortdesc: How to install the FusionInventory agent using Perl CPAN.

body.p: Perl language provides a central repository for modules called CPAN (Comprehensive Perl Archive Network).
To install the FusionInventory agent via CPAN, use the following command: cpan FusionInventory::Agent::Conf
Perl modules dependencies will be automatically added and installed.
